plot: While people living in the Peruvian Amazon seek to preserve their unique habitat, they must cut, capture, and sell anything they can to survive.
title: La Selva Tranquila
plot_es: While people living in the Peruvian Amazon seek to preserve their unique habitat, they must cut, capture, and sell anything they can to survive.
plot_en: While people living in the Peruvian Amazon seek to preserve their unique habitat, they must cut, capture, and sell anything they can to survive.
